payload.name: paraconsistent
payload.core: Tolerate contradictions without explosion. Classical logic derives everything from A and not-A; paraconsistent logics contain contradictions locally, enabling reasoning to continue in other domains.

out.d: assessment of which contradictions matter for action

proc: detect contradictions: identify A and not-A pairs in knowledge base
quarantine: isolate contradictory propositions from unrelated domains
partition reasoning: separate affected from unaffected inference chains
continue locally: derive conclusions in consistent subdomains
flag for resolution: mark contradictions requiring eventual repair
check: local inferences valid within consistent subdomains

diff.deductive: tolerates contradictions vs explodes from them
diff.belief-revision: contains contradictions vs repairs them immediately
diff.argumentation: isolates conflicts vs structures competing claims
diff.defeasible: blocks explosion vs manages defeat relations

ex.sit: Database merger: Source A says customer X lives in NYC. Source B says customer X lives in LA. Need to process orders now.
steps: detect: address(X, NYC) contradicts address(X, LA)
quarantine: isolate address domain from order processing
partition: order validity, payment, inventory unaffected
continue: process order, flag shipping for manual review
flag: escalate address conflict for resolution before shipping
ex.insight: business continues despite data inconsistency; contradiction contained rather than blocking all operations
